items.name: MCP Gateway Registry
items.description: Enterprise-ready MCP Gateway & Registry that centralizes AI development tools with secure OAuth authentication, dynamic tool discovery, and unified access for both autonomous AI agents and AI coding assistants. Transform scattered MCP server chaos into governed, auditable tool access with Keycloak/Entra integration.

items.name: MCP Registry
items.description: A community driven registry service for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers.
